SYSTEM: SPARQL_Streams.pdf: PÃ¡gina 8
Research Idea
What do we need to do to C-SPARQL to make it work?
Improve type system
Window output timestamped bag of triples
Window-to-stream operators
SPARQL 1.1 Aggregation
Periodic evaluation 
Do we need this?
What implications for SNEEql?
(This is what AG was discussing with Werner last year)
Can we extend the formalism of the translation approach of 
Chebotko et al for the integrator, i.e. formalise R2O/S2O?
Mappings that expose RDBMS data
Streaming data
speaker: SYSTEM
